snippet: Along with the legacy of first-rate criticism she left to the world, the pioneering architectural critic and historian Ada Louise Huxtable, who died at the age of 91 on Monday, has bequeathed her estate to the J. Paul Getty Trust.
abstract: Along with the legacy of first-rate criticism she left to the world, the pioneering architectural critic and historian Ada Louise Huxtable, who died at the age of 91 on Monday, has bequeathed her estate to the J. Paul Getty Trust.

headline.main: Ada Louise Huxtable Leaves Estate to Getty Trust
headline.print_headline: Huxtable Leaves Archives And Estate to Getty
